text: Need River Murphy for JB Hi-Fi campaign. Budget around $25,706, looking for 1 x Twitter post, 2 x Facebook post, 1 x Instagram post, 1 x Instagram reel, 3 x 30-second Instagram reel. 6 week exclusivity from other electronics brands. Campaign runs January 2026. Usage rights for 6 months. Engagement period: 6 months.
